ValidationRule.description: Fields required for Opp Trial Type- Trial Converted to Opp, LD Account ID, Order Source
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(contains( $Profile.Name, "Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Trial"),
ISPICKVAL( StageName, "5 - Sales Closed Won") ,
OR( ISBLANK( Trial_Converted_to_Opp__c ), ISBLANK( LD_Account_ID__c), ISPICKVAL( Order_Source__c,"" ), ISPICKVAL( Is_this_a_Reseller__c,"" )
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out Trial Converted to Opp, LD Account ID (on the account), Order Source, and Is this a Reseller
